name: OR_LOG_ANES_TECH
description: The OR_LOG_ANES_TECH table contains OR management system log anesthesia techniques.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log referred to by the anesthesia techniques.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line of the anesthesia special techniques used in the surgical log.

columns.name: ANESTH_SPEC_TECH_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which refers to any special techniques that were required when administering the anesthesia in the surgery in the surgical log.
